text: 2,4,5-Trihydroxymethamphetamine (THMA) is a neurotoxin and a metabolite of MDMA. It has structural similarity to the dopamine neurotoxin 6-hydroxydopamine, and produces lasting serotonin deficits when administered centrally. ==See also== * 2,4,5-Trihydroxyamphetamine ==References== Category:Methamphetamines Category:Recreational drug metabolites Category:Neurotoxins
title: 2,4,5-Trihydroxymethamphetamine
